displayProperties.name: Commander Zavala
displayProperties.subtitle: Legacy Gear
displayProperties.description: The resolute Commander Zavala advises Guardians on all Vanguard-related activities.

displayProperties.name: Lord Shaxx
displayProperties.subtitle: Legacy Gear
displayProperties.description: The Crucible is the arena in which Guardians forge their Light. Lord Shaxx is the Crucible.

displayProperties.name: Saint-14
displayProperties.subtitle: Legacy Gear
displayProperties.description: A legendary hero and the former Titan Vanguard, Saint-14 disappeared into the Infinite Forest only to be later rescued by a fellow Guardian.

displayProperties.name: Banshee-44
displayProperties.subtitle: Focused Decoding
displayProperties.description: Banshee-44 has lived many lives. As master weaponsmith for the Tower, he supplies Guardians with only the best.

displayProperties.name: Banshee-44
displayProperties.subtitle: Gunsmith
displayProperties.description: Banshee-44 has lived many lives. As master weaponsmith for the Tower, he supplies Guardians with only the best.

displayProperties.name: Monument to Lost Lights
displayProperties.subtitle: Exotic Archive
displayProperties.description: Built in honor of those who sacrificed their Light to defend humanity. Created in collaboration with Cryptarchs to help Guardians manage armaments.

displayProperties.name: Vanguard Ops
displayProperties.description: The Vanguard seeks Guardians to undertake high-priority missions against the City's enemies.

displayProperties.name: Pinnacle Ops
displayProperties.description: Test your might against the toughest combatants.

displayProperties.name: The Crucible
displayProperties.description: Hone your skills and win glory in battle against other Guardians.
